name: Olympic Skier
description:
Olympic Skier

 If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).

Hello and welcome to Olympic Skier, a game where you participate in three different disciplines: Slalom, Skijump and Downhill! Instructions are in the game. This game was made on Scratch by PandaTimmyMrT ( me ). Watch the Official Launch Trailer

Credits

Thanks to Turbowarp.org for generating the HTML file for me. Based on the C-64 classic "Olympic Skier" by Shaun Southern. Thanks to Google for the fonts!

Please visit PandaTimmyMrT on YouTube and PandaTimmyMrT on Scratch

Notes: There is no music in the game and global Highscore doesn't work on itch.io. If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).
